title: Hi and need help
content:
Hi All,  
 I'm very new here . Sorry to say that my very first post is going to be a "request". last few days trying to find out a font from a image. From a blog post got this forum address. If anyone can kind enough to help me out to identify this image font.  
 Thanks a lot in advance for any suggestion.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152805im_/http:/typophile.com/files/top_4456.jpg)

Font: 

 Blessed Day (Regular) (TrueType) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152805/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: vungvang

comments.content: It must be **[Blessed Day](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152805/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Blessed%20Day%20-%20Regular&fid=474fea7a12ce2b036dbcfcac9a5edff2&fsize=60&text=Fabacchi%20Cornelia&fit=1)** by Billy Argel (Free for personal use) with a modified /F

I don't know how can i Thank you " fvilanakis" . Thanks a lot man. You saved me a lot of time. And that is not a "F" ; it's a "T" . So no modification needed.  
And again thanks a lot

it's not a modified F, just a normal T  
ciao
